Description.Chinese: First Reroll of Items every x minutes is free. Increasing costs are unchanged. Items-offer does only change when rerolling or after 10 hours, instead of 5 minutes.
Description.English: First Reroll of Items every x minutes is free. Increasing costs are unchanged. Items-offer does only change when rerolling or after 10 hours, instead of 5 minutes.
Description.French: First Reroll of Items every x minutes is free. Increasing costs are unchanged. Items-offer does only change when rerolling or after 10 hours, instead of 5 minutes.
Description.German: Das erste Neuwürfeln von Items bei Händlern alle x Minuten ist kostenlos. Jedes darauffolgende Neuwürfeln kostet weiterhin unverändert +5000. Die Items werden nur noch alle 10 Stunden, anstatt 5 Minuten (also quasi nie) automatisch durchgewechselt.
